name: VicoHome
0:
”Alexa, show me the camera”
”Alexa, show me the front door”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
VicoHome skill for Amazon Alexa is to enable Echo Show to view the camera added on the VicoHome App.

1. After downloading the VicoHome App, log in or register the VicoHome account. 
2. Open the Alexa App to search VicoHome skill for Amazon Alexa and enable it, and then the Alexa-supported camera will display on the All devices page of the Alexa App. 
After that, the user can watch the streaming of the camera through the Alexa device and talk to the person in front of the camera.

After adding a new camera or deleting a camera in VicoHome App, the camera will appear or disappear on the All devices page of the Amazon Alexa App. 

If you want to view the streaming of the camera, you can say: 
"Alexa, show me the yard."
"Alexa, show me the camera."

If you want to pause, you can say: 
"Alexa, stop."
"Alexa, go home."

If you share the camera with others in the VicoHome App, they can also use the Alexa device to watch the camera’s streaming.
